title: How to Link QQ with WeChat

steps.title: Open WeChat.
steps.content: Open WeChat. It’s the green icon with two overlapping chat bubbles inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer (Android).

steps.title: Tap Me.
steps.content: Tap Me . It’s at the bottom-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap More Settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap More Settings . It’s near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Link Now.
steps.content: Tap Link Now . It’s the green button beneath the QQ icon.

steps.title: Enter your QQ username and password.
steps.content: Enter your QQ username and password.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . Your QQ account is now linked to WeChat.
